pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
